demolition

Class KeyHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • demolition.KeyHandler

  • public class KeyHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    A helper class for handling keyboard input by the player.

    • Field Summary

      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      boolean downDown

    • Method Detail

      • handlePress

        public boolean handlePress(int keyCode,
                           Player player,
                           java.util.List<Bomb> bombs,
                           GraphicsHandler graphicsHandler,
                           Tile[][] levelMap)
        Handles a new key press from the player. This includes moving and dropping bombs.
        Parameters:
        keyCode - The JS code of the key being pressed.
        player - The Player object.
        bombs - The List of current bombs.
        graphicsHandler - The GraphicsHandler object used in the app.
        levelMap - The current level map.
        Returns:
        Whether the press successfully performed an action.

      • handleRelease

        public boolean handleRelease(int keyCode)
        Resets the keyDown variables when a key is released.
        Parameters:
        keyCode - The JS code of the key being released.
        Returns:
        Whether this actually resulted in a keyDown variable being reset.
